name: Night King
bio: The Night King is the master and the first of the White Walkers, having existed since the age of the First Men.

name: Tyrion Lannister
bio: Tyrion uses his status as a Lannister to mitigate the prejudice he has received all of his life, even from his family.

name: John Snow
bio: In A Game of Thrones, Jon Snow is introduced as the 14-year-old illegitimate son of Eddard Ned Stark, Lord of Winterfell.

name: Cersei Lannister
bio: Cersei is a member of House Lannister, one of the wealthiest and most powerful families in the kingdom of Westeros.

name: Arya Stark
bio: She is tomboyish, headstrong, feisty, independent, disdains traditional female pursuits, and is often mistaken for a boy.

name: Daenerys Targaryen
bio: Daenerys is sold off by her brother Viserys and Illyrio Mopatis to marry Khal Drogo, a Dothraki warlord, in exchange for an army for Viserys.

name: Gregor Clegane
bio: Daenerys is sold off by her brother Viserys and Illyrio Mopatis to marry Khal Drogo, a Dothraki warlord, in exchange for an army for Viserys.

name: Sansa Stark
bio: Sansa Stark is the eldest daughter and second child of Lady Catelyn and Lord Eddard Stark.

name: Drogo
bio: Drogo is a khal or warlord of the Dothraki, the famed nomadic horse-lords of the eastern continent beyond the Narrow Sea.
